item.description:
This is a joint event with the Providence Winos meetup group.

250 new wines, soak up knowledge from the experts, and grab tasty food pairings under $5. Throw in a DJ, photo booth, lounge, and more - this isn't your parents' wine tasting. Catch the Riot April 16th and 17th 2010, at Boston's Center for the Arts in the South End.

http://www.thewinerio...
http://www.thewinerio...

You MUST buy your own tickets! Go to the Wine Riot website and select Riot One - $45
Saturday, April 17th, 2010 from 1 - 5pm

We will be taking the 11:20am train from the Providence Station to Boston's Back Bay. I will meet members at Cafe La France starting at 11am, and will be emailing event attendees my cell phone number on Friday evening. If you are meeting us in Boston, we will wait by the event entrance - we should get there by 12:45pm and will wait for you about ten minutes.
item.how_to_find_us: Cafe la France in PVD train station at 11am or 12:45pm outside event entrance
item.name: Wine Riot in Boston w/ PVD Winos
